title: Does my phone support Instant Message run in background such as QQ and QQ videos? Can I send images and download chat records? How can I clear the chat records of a certain QQ account?
answer:
Your phone supports background QQ and QQ videos. 

 The latest QQ version supports sending images and downloading chat records. 

 For example, in QQ 5.0, to delete all the chat records, on the chat screen, swipe right and touch Settings > Chat records > Clear all records.
